alert.note: Alert for Cuyama Valley; San Luis Obispo County Interior Valleys; San Luis Obispo County Mountains; Santa Lucia Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 28 at 1:10PM PDT until March 29 at 5:00AM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM PDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected, strongest in the mountains. * WHERE...Cuyama Valley, Santa Lucia Mountains, San Luis Obispo County Interior Valleys and San Luis Obispo County Mountains. * WHEN...Until 5 AM PDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Cuyama Valley; San Luis Obispo County Interior Valleys; San Luis Obispo County Mountains; Santa Lucia Mountains
